metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18408 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A use-after-free was discovered in the tcpbridge binary of Tcpreplay 4.3.0 beta1. The issue gets triggered in the function post_args() at tcpbridge.c, causing a denial of service or possibly unspecified other impact.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-18408` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 4.3.3-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.3-2').
